hero.title: Xero Degrees: This Isn't Just Food, It's an Experience.
hero.subtitle: Home of the iconic freak shakes, cheesy pizzas in a jar, and loaded fries that will change your life. We're here to serve up unforgettable moments and seriously good food.

about.title: The Story Behind Xero Degrees
about.paragraph1: It all started with a simple, yet bold idea: to create a space where food isn't just eaten, but celebrated. Xero Degrees was born from a passion for pushing culinary boundaries and serving up pure joy in every bite. We threw out the rulebook to bring you a menu that's as unique and vibrant as our community.
about.paragraph2: From our first kitchen to our growing family of cafes, our mission remains the same: to be your favorite spot for comfort food with a twist. We believe in fresh ingredients, bold flavors, and creating a welcoming vibe where friends can connect and make memories. Come see what the buzz is about and join the Xero Degrees family today!
